hero.headline: Professional Oven Cleaning in Bedfordshire
hero.subheadline: Shiny ovens, happy homes — no harsh chemicals, just incredible results from a local, family-run business.

about.title: About Us
about.description: AWM Cleaning is a family-run, fully insured oven cleaning business serving Bedford and the surrounding villages. We provide child and pet-safe deep cleans for ovens, hobs, extractors, microwaves, BBQs and more. With years of experience and a passion for sparkling kitchens, we leave your appliances looking like new.

items.title: Single & Double Oven Cleans
items.description: Transform your oven with our thorough, chemical-free cleaning service.

items.title: Range Cookers & Hobs
items.description: We tackle the toughest stains on range cookers, gas and electric hobs.

items.title: Extractors & Filters
items.description: Keep your kitchen air clean with our expert extractor fan and filter cleaning.

items.title: Microwaves & BBQs
items.description: Inside or out, we'll get your microwave or BBQ gleaming and ready to use.

items.title: Package Deals
items.description: Book multiple services for discounted prices — perfect for landlords and moving home!

items.title: Incredible Results
items.description: We leave ovens sparkling — inside and out.

items.title: Fully Insured & Reliable
items.description: Peace of mind with every visit.

items.title: Pet & Child Friendly
items.description: No harsh chemicals, just a clean you can trust.

items.title: Family-Run
items.description: We care about every customer like they're our neighbour.

items.title: Easy Booking
items.description: Call or message — we'll take care of the rest.

quotes.name: Jodie Strong
quotes.quote: Had my oven cleaned this week by Alex and he did an incredible job — it looks brand new. It was honestly in such a shameful state. I'd highly recommend him to anyone. Great prices too — I'll definitely use AWM every time now.

quotes.name: Nicola Cox
quotes.quote: Cannot recommend enough! Oven is now shiny and new. Very polite and professional, left the kitchen spotless. Great aftercare advice too. 5⭐️ service!

quotes.name: Olivia Anne
quotes.quote: Absolutely fab service — our oven and hob looked brand new afterwards! Really friendly, informative and professional. Thank you again!

items.question: Are your products safe for kids and pets?
items.answer: Yes! We only use non-toxic, fume-free cleaning solutions that are safe for all households.

items.question: How long does a clean take?
items.answer: Most oven cleans take around 1.5 to 2 hours depending on the condition and type of appliance.

items.question: What areas do you cover?
items.answer: We serve Bedford and all surrounding areas including Kempston, Wootton, Marston Moretaine, and nearby villages.

contact.title: Get a Free Quote
contact.description: Call Alex on 07547 953226 or drop us a message — we'll get your oven shining again in no time!
